original_text: They shall be ministers in my sanctuary, having oversight at the gates of the temple and ministering in the temple. They shall slaughter the burnt offering and the sacrifice for the people, and they shall stand before the people, to minister to them.
korean_text: 그러나 그들이 내 성소에서 수종들어 성전 문을 맡을 것이며 성전에서 수종들어 백성의 번제의 희생물과 다른 희생물을 잡아 백성 앞에 서서 수종들게 되리라

sentences.original_text: They shall be ministers in my sanctuary
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 성소에서 사역자들이 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: having oversight at the gates of the temple
They shall slaughter the burnt offering
and the sacrifice for the people
and they shall stand before the people
